room1.name: Curiosity Room
room1.description: This is a room meticulously designed to spark curiosity. Filled with books on various topics, intricate puzzles to solve, and a magnifying glass to inspect the world in detail.

room2.name: Acceptance Room
room2.description: A room thoughtfully designed to promote acceptance. It houses a comfortable couch, fluffy pillows, and diverse artwork signifying acceptance and unity.

room3.name: Knowledge Room
room3.description: A room strategically designed to promote learning. Featuring a whiteboard for ideas, books for research, and a desk for deep study.

room4.name: Communication Room
room4.description: A room specifically designed to promote communication. It houses a large table for group discussions, chairs for comfort, and a phone for remote communication.

room5.name: Love Room
room5.description: A room passionately designed to promote love. Scented candles, beautiful flowers, and soothing music create a romantic atmosphere.
